title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 27 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 27 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush all over the news. TMZ on Rush and “Macho Man”. Trump has spent his life solving problems. Misleading report on Northern California coronavirus patient. Buzzfeed lies, says Rush said Deep State created the virus to weaponize against Trump. Drive-Bys up in arms over Pence leading response. Tom Steyer: Coronavirus is Trump’s Katrina. Buzzfeed story distorts what Rush said about Deep State. Trump asked about Rush at press conference. Why are they so worried about what a guy on the radio says? The market and the economy. Dems still trying to stop Crazy Bernie.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Apple and the market sell-off. Pence calls in AIDS expert to lead coronavirus response. If there’s a recession, don’t participate. 33,000 people have recovered from coronavirus. Tim Cook optimistic Apple getting back to normal. What the coronavirus 2% mortality rate really means. Trump’s press conference. Bezos’ Post smears Rush. Chicago homicides compared to coronavirus threat.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Bernie supporters think Democrats are trying to steal South Carolina from him. Bernie promises to legalize pot and only allow blacks and Hispanics to sell it. Trump coronavirus press conference. Media zeroes in on Rush. Rush gives an update on his health and treatment. Rush delivers fiery monologue on Democrats seeing an “opening” to get Trump in a pandemic. Trump believes nothing is inevitable.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
